channel.title: Need a good beginner source and client!
channel.description: Hi, sorry if I'm posting this is wrong section but I was just wondering if anyone could link me to a good pking source and client which is easy to code. I am a new coder and trying to learn how to code servers. All I know is how to move shops but anyways if you do have a good source and client thats pking and easy to code please pm me or reply to this topic thanks :)

i’d recommend Trisidiax V2, i used it as first.
